bug.author: donghaoye
bug.summary: Something wrong with get_coco_joint_names() and get_3dpw_joint_names() [BUG]
bug.description: the order of get_coco_joint_names is wrong.

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/donghaoye>@donghaoye</denchmark-link> , I double checked it, there is no mistake.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mkocabas>@mkocabas</denchmark-link> Hi, according to the 3dpw descriptions of the readme of 3dpw, the 2D joint detections in Coco-Format for each actor. I think the below order is right. def get_coco_joint_names(): return [ "nose", # 0 "neck", # 1 "lshoulder", # 2 "lelbow", # 3 "lwrist", # 4 "rshoulder", # 5 "relbow", # 6 "rwrist", # 7 "lhip", # 8 "lknee", # 9 "lankle", # 10 "rhip", # 11 "rknee", # 12 "rankle", # 13 "leye", # 14 "reye", # 15 "lear", # 16 "rear", # 17 ]
